>
[Flurry of Maneuvers](/Feats.aspx?ID=5992) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 121 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

Your flurry is a combination of maneuvers. You can replace one or both of your attacks during a [Flurry of Blows](/Actions.aspx?ID=2817) with [Grapples](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376), [Repositions](/Actions.aspx?ID=2379), [Shoves](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380), or [Trips](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382).
